text:
Pant is a small village in Shropshire in England. It is in the civil parish of Llanymynech and Pant. It is located on the border with Powys in Wales. It is situated 15 miles north west of Shrewsbury, the county town.
In the 2011 census, the village's population was listed under the civil parish's population, which was 2,100 people.
The village's name means "hollow" in Welsh.
